subject: Olympic Games (1972)
Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
Terrorism
Kidnapping and Hostages
lead_paragraph: Family members of the Israeli victims of Palestinian terrorists at the Munich Olympics are speaking openly in an effort to get their loved ones the recognition they believe is deserved.
snippet: Family members of the Israeli victims of Palestinian terrorists at the Munich Olympics are speaking openly in an effort to get their loved ones the recognition they believe is deserved.
